text: 4.5 Lom 2.1, 2.29, 1 Ko 3.8, 2 Ko 5.10, Lep 20.12 Anɨb ak mɨñɨl yɨp takaw anɨb ak tek ma agɨnɨmɨb. Kɨdek Bɨawl ne ke apɨl, ñɨn anɨb ak takaw anɨb ak tek agɨnɨgab. Ne tap we gel kɨsɨlɨm nab mɨdeb okok dɨl, mɨlek nab okok lɨnɨgab. Pen binɨb okok mɨdupsek gos kɨli nab ayaŋ abe nɨŋɨd mɨseŋ agɨnɨgab. Ñɨn anɨb ak, God binɨb mɨdupsek nɨnokom gɨpal gɨpal tek, kɨlop takaw tep agɨnɨgab.
